title: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity Attributes DataTypes
description: Ad Cloud Top Level Entity Attributes DataTypes

externalId.title: External Entity ID
externalId.description: Unique External identifier as represented by the network for the entity object.

network.title: Network
network.description: Network Name as defined by the search partners.

createdTime.title: Created Time of the Entity in Ad Cloud platform
createdTime.description: Created Time when entity got created in Ad Cloud Platform.This can differ from modified time in external advertising platform partners.

modifiedTime.title: Modified Time of the Entity in Ad Cloud Platform
modifiedTime.description: Modified Time when entity was last modified in Ad Cloud Platform. This can differ from modified time in external advertising platform partners.
